availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Selenia W. Stone. Father of Robert S. Stone, William H. Stone, Mary T. Stone, Willis J. Stone, Hardin M. Stone, and Salina B. Stone. Farmer in Marshall County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Palma post office, p. 159; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Briensburg District 7, p. 12; Find A Grave, "Moses Enos Stone (1813 - 1883)," Memorial #123822484, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=123822484 (accessed July 6, 2017).
